column1: #Text=JR : Especially based in New York , yeah .
#Text=DS : Do you find that when you have friends outside the city , and they know you 're raising kids here , they bate their breath ?
#Text=So many people still have this vision of New York from like " The Warriors , " ; from the Abe Beame days of New York .
#Text=The funny thing is we were just in San Diego and my daughter , who 's three , would just lie on the floor moaning in boredom , because it 's so boring there .
#Text=We were in a couple of houses , one of which had a pool .
#Text=She was fine when there was a pool .
#Text=But the driving -- she just hated it !

#Text=You have to drive to go anywhere , and we could n't find our health-food-store food…and we 're driving around for forty minutes , and she just would sit in the back saying , " I do n't want to live in the suburbs .
